text: The Barracuda is an alcoholic cocktail based on Gold rum, Galliano liqueur, pineapple juice, fresh lime juice and top with Prosecco, per IBA specified ingredients. ==See also== * Barracuda * List of cocktails * ==References== Category:Cocktails with rum Category:Cocktails with liqueur Category:Tiki drinks Category:Cocktails with lime juice Category:Cocktails with pineapple juice Category:Cocktails with Champagne Category:Bubbly cocktails
title: Barracuda (cocktail)
